## Publication.templateBundleProcess property

If a Template Bundle Process is specified, Templates must be added to a Bundle before they can be checked in. The Bundle has to be of an appropriate type. That is: The Bundle's Schema has to be associated with this Process Definition.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get templateBundleProcess(): Link | undefined;
```
